name: My Coworker is a Devil!
description:
Alex Gutierrez is an ordinary girl working an ordinary job in an ordinary company. That is until a new not-so-normal coworker, Nerissa shows up in her life, thrusting her to the supernatural. As the underworld's most wanted mortal, Nerissa offers her a deal.

Game is free but if you like it enough, donations are appreciated <3
